data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Misamis Occidental, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Misamis Occidental, Philippines
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 35,465 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Misamis Occidental.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 35,465 believers in Misamis Occidental against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Sindhi people.
Spirit, help the 35,465 believers find a person of peace today among the 219,134 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Misamis Occidental, Philippines to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 219,134 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Misamis Occidental. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’
